snippet: In a panel discussion on the Indian Point nuclear power plant north of New York City, Japanese relief workers spoke of often-useless preparation in the face of a catastrophe.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on panel discussion held by Hudson River advocacy organization Clearwater over renewal of the operating license for the Indian Point nuclear power plant; group is invoking the catastrophe at Japan's nuclear power plant complex in Fukushima in its arguments opposing renewal of the Indian Point license.
lead_paragraph: In a panel discussion on the Indian Point nuclear power plant north of New York City, Japanese relief workers spoke of often-useless preparation in the face of a catastrophe.

headline.seo: In Indian Point Nuclear Debate, Japanese Voices Bear Witness
headline.main: From Japan, Bearing Witness in Debate Over Indian Point
headline.print_headline: Witnesses From Japan On Indian Pt.
